data.title: Department of Recreation & Parks
data.meta_description: We’re Back this Summer with multiple Camp Options!
data.text:
Cecil Kirk

Dewees

Greenmount

Harlem Park

Solo Gibbs

Dewees

Specialty camps offer themed camps from sports to leadership. Check out the camp descriptions below to find the best fit for your camper.

Sports & Fitness Summer Camp - Register Here

Date: June 26 - August 18

Time: 8:30AM - 4:00PM

Ages: 8-14

Cost: $400

Sports & Fitness Summer Camp hosted at William J. Myers Soccer Pavilion is a healthy mix of sports curriculums and fitness for eight weeks. Participants have a sport of the week and learn the fundamentals for that sport while competing in fun activities throughout the week. Sports & Fitness Camp participants also have the opportunity to enjoy field trips, guest speakers, video games, swimming, STEM activities, and more!

LOCATION - Myers Pavilion

Summer Basketball Camp - Register Here

Date: June 26 - August 18

Time: 8:30AM - 3:30PM

Ages: 7-13

Cost: $200

This basketball camp focuses on shooting, dribbling, passing, defensive skills and other basketball fundamentals. Full instruction and review of basketball rules and regulations are covered, as well as detailed breakdowns of offensive sets, defensive sets and floor spacing. Other topics covered include basketball history, team-building activities, aerobic workouts, resistance training, games and more.

LOCATION - Madison Square Recreation Center

All-Star Tennis Camp - Register Here

Date: June 26 - August 18

Time: 8:30AM - 4:00PM

Ages: 7-14

Cost: $100 per week

All-Star Tennis Camp is an 8-week camp is focused on teaching the fundamentals of tennis and is packed with fun activities for learners of all skill levels. The camp is staffed by knowledgeable tennis staff who have many years of experience in playing and instructing youth who have enjoy the game for life. The cost of the camp is $100/week or $800.00 total for eight weeks.

LOCATION - Patterson Park

Summer Nature Camp at Carrie Murray - Register Here

Dates/Ages:

July 10-14 Ages 6-11

July 17-21 Ages 6-11

July 31-August 4 Ages 6-11

August 7-11 Ages 12-14

Time: 9:00AM - 3:00PM

Cost: $200 per week

Located in the largest urban forested park east of the Mississippi, our nature camp provides fun outdoor learning experiences! Join us for active exploring and hands-on play as we make new friends and discover the natural treasures of Gwynns Falls Park. Stream studies, insect investigation, creative arts and games are all part of the fun! This is an all outdoor camp. If there is inclement weather (forecast of heavy thunderstorms and/or high winds) camp will be cancelled that day. Otherwise the camp is rain or shine.

We give children frequent water breaks and cool down times on hot days, but children should be prepared to hike at least 1 mile from day 3-5. NOTE: Campers must bring water bottles, a packed lunch with ice pack, and a protective mask each day. Wear clothes that can get messy! NOTE: There is no before and aftercare option. The cost to participate is $200.

LOCATION - Carrie Murray Nature Center

BCRP Teen Camp - Register Here

Date: July 10 - August 18

Time: 8:30AM - 5:30PM

Ages: 13-17

Cost: $100 per week

BCRP Teen Camp is a leadership development program that encourages independence, personal growth and exploration. The program is open to teens ages 13 – 17. Through participation in interactive workshops, this will prepare the teens for leadership roles and employment. Our goal is to empower young people with the skills and ability to move into positions working in our summer camps or a Recreation Center. Young people will learn about employment opportunities they can pursue within Recreation and Parks. The session will conclude with participants coordinating and implementing a service-learning project benefiting a local Recreation Center, Park or Community. In addition to developing useful skills, participants will have the opportunity to apply for continuing employment with BCRP. At Teen Camp, young people will establish lasting friendships, develop a sense of responsibility, learn to work effectively in groups, build accountability, and gain the confidence to solve problems independently. Participants will also receive an opportunity to swim once a week and attend weekly field trips. Employment opportunities may be available after successful completion of the Teen Camp for ages 16- and 17-year-olds. Registrants must make the full 6-week commitment. Program dates are July 10 – August 18, 2023. The cost of each camp session is $100.

LOCATIONS -

Bocek

Cecil Kirk

Oliver

Middle Branch

Towanda

Makerspace Exploration (STEM) Camp - Register Here

Dates/Ages:

July 17-21 Ages 8-10

July 31-August 4 Ages 11-13

Time: 9:00AM - 3:00PM

Cost: FREE

Join the Rec2Tech team for an exciting week of learning new skills and gaining hands-on experiences with a variety of makerspace technologies! Participants will explore both low-tech and high-tech projects using a combination of basic tools and leading-edge manufacturing equipment. Get to know the Maker community that's all about doing, learning, sharing, and making! This program will culminate with an end-of-week showcase where you'll share what you made with families and friends. Cost is FREE.
